summary: Provides end‑to‑end training and fine‑tuning pipelines for a hybrid automatic speech recognition and text‑to‑speech system, supporting combined audio‑text and text‑only corpora, BPE tokenization, optional speech enhancement, and integrated experiment logging and checkpoint management.
business_intent: Accelerates the development of advanced speech‑enabled applications by allowing teams to build and refine ASR models that benefit from TTS knowledge, improving accuracy for voice assistants, transcription services, and other conversational AI products.
